I am deeply touched by the gratitude and hospitality of New York audience!
Bravo maestro Pavel Nersessian !
Thanks SFMRNY and Raisa Bahchieva in person for organising this event!

It was a remarkable moment!
Bravi tutti!
@operasofia I will miss you!
